column2: Certain religions and cultures are allowed to subjugate others rulers once in their lifetime. (With the 'Become King' ambition, there is no such time limit against targets within the kingdom.)
The Sages are the traditional care takers of holy sites for the $RELIGION$ church.
column3: Les pentarques étaient les cinq patriarches originels de l'Église Chrétienne. Leur autorité en tant que patriarches autocéphales sur leurs Églises respectives est toujours reconnue par l'Église $RELIGION$.
column4: Die Pentarchie waren die fünf Patriarchate der frühchristlichen Kirche. Ihre Authorität innerhalb ihrer Stammsitze ist innerhalb der $RELIGION$en Kirche noch immer anerkannt.
column6: Los Pentarcas fueron los cinco Patriarcas originales del Cristianismo. Su autoridad como Patriarcas autocéfalos sobre sus antiguas sedes es todavía reconocida por la religión $RELIGION$.

column2: Multiple Patriarchs - the five Pentarchs and Autocephalous Patriarchs under Kings
column3: Patriarches multiples – les cinq pentarques et patriarches autocéphales dépendant de rois
column4: Mehrere Patriarchen: die fünf Pentarchen und die Autokephalen Patriarchen unter Königen
column6: Patriarcas múltiples - los cinco pentarcas y patriarcas autocéfalos bajo reyes

column2: Apart from the original five Sages all other $RELIGION$ kingdoms or empires also have their own autonomous Sage. The Court Chaplain of such a kingdom or empire is also considered the Sage of that realm. He will always do what his liege asks of him. Each High Priest controls Excommunication within their respective realm.
